GET /api.description: Serves a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api.

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics.

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles.

GET /api/users/:username.description: Serves the details of one user, by username.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves the details of one article, by ID.

article.author: dahlia

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Patches (updates) the vote count of one article, by ID, and returns that article.

article.author: dahlia
article.title: New Waste
article.body: Waste mgmt is a real issue...

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves a comments array of the comments of one article, by ID.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a new comment, referencing one article which is selected by ID.

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a comment, by ID, returning no body.

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Patches (updates) the vote count of one comment, by ID, and returns that comment.
